meanings.definition: The quality or state of being easily managed or controlled.
meanings.sent1: Her tractablenesses made her the perfect student to work with.
meanings.sent2: The tractablenesses of the new software system impressed the entire team.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's tractablenesses towards learning new tricks brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent4: The ocean's tractablenesses to the moon's pull create the tides.
meanings.sent5: The teacher appreciated the student's tractablenesses in following instructions.

meanings.definition: The capacity to be influenced or guided.
meanings.sent1: His tractablenesses allowed him to adapt easily to different environments.
meanings.sent2: The tractablenesses of the team members ensured a smooth decision-making process.
meanings.sent3: The plant's tractablenesses to sunlight and water made it thrive in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The politician's tractablenesses to public opinion shaped his policies.
meanings.sent5: The child's tractablenesses to his parents' advice helped him make wise choices.
